articles.title: Why voting rights groups warn the SAVE Act may make it harder for married women to vote - PBS
articles.description: An estimated 69 million American women and 4 million men do not have a birth certificate that matches their current legal name.
articles.content:
This story was originally published by The 19th on April 10, 2025.
The U.S. House has passed a bill that voting rights groups have repeatedly warned would make it harder for millions of Americans, i… [+1961 chars]
